channel.title: Git on Incubyte Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Git on Incubyte Blog

item.title: Build Your Own Git Hosting Service
item.description: Yes, you read that right! We can create our remote repository service by setting up and hosting it on our own server. It works just like popular services such as GitHub or Bitbucket but with the added benefit of complete control over access and hosting.

item.title: Five Git Tricks To Make Crafting Software Easier
item.description: Git is the most widely used version control system in the world and it is something that every Software Craftsperson should master.
